channel.title: Dialogue help

item.title: Dialogue help
item.dc:creator: @Magicalist Magicalist
item.description:
@Magicalist wrote:

I added a dialogue in Matrix the dialogue starts normal but when i get this
and i try to click on the options nothing happens the options doesnt close.
Heres my dialogue

[code]package com.rs.game.player.dialogues;

import com.rs.cache.loaders.NPCDefinitions;
import com.rs.game.WorldTile;
import com.rs.utils.ShopsHandler;
import com.rs.utils.PkRank;

public class Mandrith extends Dialogue {

private int npcId;

@Override
public void start() {
	npcId = (Integer) parameters[0];
	sendNPCDialogue(npcId, 9827, "-", "-" );
}

@Override
public void run(int interfaceId, int componentId) {
	switch(stage) {
	case -1:
		stage = 0;
		sendOptionsDialogue(SEND_DEFAULT_OPTIONS_TITLE,
				"-",
				"-",
				"-");
	break;
	case 0:
		switch(componentId) {
		case 1:
		sendNPCDialogue(npcId, 9827, "-");
		break;
		case 2:
		ShopsHandler.openShop(player, 2);
			end();
		break;
		case 3:
		sendEntityDialogue(SEND_1_TEXT_CHAT,
				new String[] { player. getDisplayName(), "-" },
				IS_PLAYER, player.getIndex(), 9827);
		}
	}

}

@Override
public void finish() {
	// TODO Auto-generated method stub

}

}
[/code]
